Question: What are the names of the teams that participated in the World Cup tournament held in 2018?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[participation:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2018
RETURN team, participation, tournament, team.name
Rewrite: Which teams competed in the 2018 World Cup tournament?

Question: Can you find the birthday and name of the player who scored the winning goal in the 2014 final match?
Cypher:
MATCH (final_match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year: 2014}),
      (scorer:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(final_match),
      (scorer)-[:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team),
      (other_team:Team)-[:PLAYED_IN]->(final_match)
WHERE final_match.stage = 'Final' AND scored.minute = '90' AND
      (team)-[:PLAYED_IN {score: scorer_score, penaltyScore: scorer_penaltyScore}]->(final_match) AND
      (other_team)-[:PLAYED_IN {score: other_team_score, penaltyScore: other_team_penaltyScore}]->(final_match) AND
      scorer_score > other_team_score
RETURN final_match, tournament, scorer, scored, team, other_team, scorer.name, scorer.dob
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (final_match:Match)-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {year: 2014}),
      (scorer:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(final_match),
      (scorer)-[relation7:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team),
      (other_team:Team)-[relation8:PLAYED_IN]->(final_match)
WHERE final_match.stage = 'Final' AND scored.minute = '90' AND
      (team)-[relation9:PLAYED_IN {score: scorer_score, penaltyScore: scorer_penaltyScore}]->(final_match) AND
      (other_team)-[relation10:PLAYED_IN {score: other_team_score, penaltyScore: other_team_penaltyScore}]->(final_match) AND
      scorer_score > other_team_score
RETURN relation10, relation9, relation8, relation7, relation5, final_match, tournament, scorer, scored, team, other_team, scorer.name, scorer.dob
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you provide the full match details, including the teams and the scorer's personal information, for the winning goal scored in the last minute of the 2014 Tournament Final?

Question: Could you list the date and stage of every match where the score was above 3-3 in the 2022 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (world_cup:Tournament)-[match_tournament_relation:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(football_match:Match)<-[team_played_relation:PLAYED_IN]-(team:Team)
WHERE world_cup.year = 2022 AND team_played_relation.score > 3
RETURN world_cup, football_match, match_tournament_relation, team_played_relation, team, football_match.date, football_match.stage
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (world_cup:Tournament)-[match_tournament_relation:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(football_match:Match)<-[team_played_relation:PLAYED_IN]-(team:Team)
WHERE world_cup.year = 2022 AND team_played_relation.score > 3
RETURN world_cup, football_match, match_tournament_relation, team_played_relation, team, football_match.date, football_match.stage
Rewrite: Can you provide the date and stage of each game in the 2022 World Cup where the score exceeded 3-3?

Question: What are the names of all persons who were coaches for any squad in the 2006 World Cup?
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (coach:Person)-[relation3:COACH_FOR]->(squad:Squad)-[relation4:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament {year: 2006})
RETURN relation4, relation3, tournament, squad, coach, coach.name
Rewrite: List all individuals who served as coaches for any team during the 2006 World Cup.

Question: Retrieve the names of the tournaments where a team scored more than 5 goals in any match during the 1998 World Cup.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_rel:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament_rel:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 1998 AND played_rel.score > 5
RETURN tournament, tournament.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_rel:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament_rel:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 1998 AND played_rel.score > 5
RETURN in_tournament_rel, played_rel, match, team, tournament, tournament.name
Rewrite: List the names of tournaments in which a team netted over 5 goals in a single match throughout the 1998 World Cup.

Question: Identify the players who played for more than 90 minutes in the matches of the 2010 World Cup quarter-finals.
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[play_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2010 AND match.stage = "Quarter-finals" AND toInteger(play_in.minuteOn) > 90
RETURN player, play_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, player.name
Rewrite: Determine which players participated for over 90 minutes in the 2010 World Cup quarter-final games.

Question: What is the average number of goals per match in the 2014 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2014
RETURN AVG(COUNT(scored)) as AvgGoalsPerMatch

Question: How many different teams have appeared in all the finals of the World Cup tournaments between 1998 and 2018?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)<-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(match:Match)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1998 AND tournament.year <= 2018 AND match.stage = "Final"
WITH team, COUNT(DISTINCT tournament) AS finalsCount
MATCH (totalTournament:Tournament)
WHERE totalTournament.year >= 1998 AND totalTournament.year <= 2018
WITH team, finalsCount, COUNT(totalTournament) AS totalFinals
WHERE finalsCount = totalFinals
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT team)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[relation4:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament)<-[relation5:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(match:Match)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1998 AND tournament.year <= 2018 AND match.stage = "Final"
WITH team, COUNT(DISTINCT tournament) AS finalsCount
MATCH (totalTournament:Tournament)
WHERE totalTournament.year >= 1998 AND totalTournament.year <= 2018
WITH team, finalsCount, COUNT(totalTournament) AS totalFinals
WHERE finalsCount = totalFinals
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT team)
Rewrite: Between 1998 and 2018, how many unique teams participated in every World Cup final?

Question: What is the total number of players who participated in both the 2002 and 2006 World Cups?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2002 OR tournament.year=2006
WITH player, COLLECT(tournament.year) AS years
WHERE ALL(y IN [2002, 2006] WHERE y IN years)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[relation3:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)-[relation4:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year=2002 OR tournament.year=2006
WITH player, COLLECT(tournament.year) AS years
WHERE ALL(y IN [2002, 2006] WHERE y IN years)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)
Rewrite: How many players took part in both the 2002 and 2006 World Cups?

Question: Can you calculate the minimum age of players who scored a goal in the 2018 World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scoredGoal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year = 2018
RETURN MIN(date().year - player.dob.year) AS MinAgeOfScoringPlayer
Rewrite: Could you determine the youngest age among those who netted a goal during the 2018 World Cup?

Question: What was the maximum score achieved by any team during the matches of World Cup 2002?
Rewrite: What was the highest score attained by any team in the 2002 World Cup matches?

Question: How many matches ended in a penalty shootout in the World Cup from 1990 to 2010?
Cypher:
MATCH (match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1990 AND tournament.year <= 2010 AND match.stage = "Penalty Shootout"
RETURN COUNT(match) AS NumberOfPenaltyShootouts
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (match:Match)-[relation2:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 1990 AND tournament.year <= 2010 AND match.stage = "Penalty Shootout"
RETURN COUNT(match) AS NumberOfPenaltyShootouts
Rewrite: Between 1990 and 2010, how many World Cup matches were decided by a penalty shootout?
